articles.author: Matt Somerfield
articles.title: Bahrain GP: F1 technical images direct from the pitlane - Motorsport.com
articles.description: Join us as we delve into the Formula 1 technical features on display in the pitlane as teams prepare for the Bahrain Grand Prix, courtesy of Giorgio Piola and Sutton Images.
articles.content:
Alfa Romeo C43 technical detail
Photo by: Giorgio Piola
Alfa Romeo is the first team to apply a solution that was pioneered by Mercedes in 2022, with the Swiss-based outfit looking to refine the fl… [+3549 chars]

articles.author: David McDonnell
articles.title: Erik ten Hag warns Man Utd players over "standards" after dressing room rollicking - The Mirror
articles.description: Manchester United have been rejuvenated this season thanks to Erik ten Hag's management - but the Dutchman was forced to borrow Sir Alex Ferguson's hairdryer against West Ham
articles.content:
Erik ten Hag has warned his Manchester United players he will not compromise on his high standards as he plots the club's route back to the top.
